content:
To normalize the provided profile data according to the specified guidelines, I'll follow the normalization instructions for each relevant field. Let's process the input profile:

### Input Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Sr. Software Eng",
  "location": "SF Bay Area",
  "key_skills": [
    "Python",
    "Data Analysis",
    "Machine Lrng"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Google LLC",
      "title": "Software Eng",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "March 2018",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "Mountain View, CA"
    },
    {
      "company": "Facebook, Inc.",
      "title": "Jr. Software Developer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "June 2015",
        "end_date": "February 2018",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "Menlo Park, CA"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Normalized Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
  "location": "San Francisco, California, United States",
  "key_skills": [
    "Python",
    "Data Analysis",
    "Machine Learning"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Google LLC",
      "title": "Software Engineer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2018-03",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "Mountain View, California, United States"
    },
    {
      "company": "Facebook, Inc.",
      "title": "Junior Software Developer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2015-06",
        "end_date": "2018-02",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "Menlo Park, California, United States"
    }
  ],
  "normalization_notes": "Standardized SF Bay Area to San Francisco; Expanded job title abbreviations; Standardized location format."
}
```

### Explanation of Changes
1. **Title Normalization**: 
   - "Sr. Software Eng" was expanded to "Senior Software Engineer".
   - "Software Eng" was expanded to "Software Engineer".
   - "Jr. Software Developer" was expanded to "Junior Software Developer".

2. **Location Normalization**:
   - "SF Bay Area" was standardized to "San Francisco, California, United States".
   - "Mountain View, CA" was standardized to "Mountain View, California, United States".
   - "Menlo Park, CA" was standardized to "Menlo Park, California, United States".

3. **Skills Normalization**:
   - "Machine Lrng" was expanded to "Machine Learning".

4. **Date Normalization**:
   - Dates were converted to ISO format (e.g., "March 2018" to "2018-03").

5. **Normalization Notes**:
   - Added notes to highlight key changes and standardizations made during the normalization process.
